message.body: My batting average stands at 1.000 ;-) Please keep quiet for now, will announce after offer letter is signed. & please thank ####- I pushed for more vacation days & got them!
YAY! congratulations! I am so happy for you. Do you have a tentative move/start date?
Start Nov. 12, and will probably try to move on Friday the 9th or Sat the 10th. I will likely ask for ####'s help with driving if he doesn't mind :-|
